changelogversion.changelogtext: Initial release.
MSM: KGSL: Increase REG_RBBM_CNTL value to 0xFFFF for A200
PM / Hibernate: Make default image size depend on total RAM size
ADD: KSM support
ADD: ZRAM support
FIX: OVERCLOCK : Increase Axsis-Bus Overclocking
NETFILTER: networking based updates
FIX: KSM.
sched, autogroup: Fix reference leak
ADD: smartass2, interactivex and savagedzen governors
FIX: charger .... but res/charger images still broken...:(
ADD: vr and sio i/O schedulers
block: prepare I/O context code for BFQ-v5
block: cgroups, kconfig, build bits for BFQ-v5
block: introduce the BFQ-v5 I/O sched
Disabled: bfq scheduler for the time being
Fix: the battery capacity calculation logic
fix: make clean/mrproper
SD-Merge build on request of my friends at WA :)
MSM: qdsp5: Fix logging adsp messages for 32-bit address
Add: GPU OC->307200000
Update: smartass
board-msm7x27a: Increase PMEM_ADSP Size by 1 mb
board-msm7x27a: Reduce pmem mdp size to 27MB
board-msm7x27a: Increase PMEM for Low Power Audio
Genlock: update to ics_chocolate......! pheww(>_<)
Revert: SD-MERGE
makefile optimization & fix derp
block fbearlysuspend to not break android's crt-off animation
